about_the_game:
Filomena finally leaves her home to enjoy the garden during the springtime. When she discovers a flyer for a gardening contest, she decides to participate while waiting for her beloved granddaughter, Frida.

Join Filomena on her journey to the contest's end and enjoy a soothing experience as you:

  • Tend to the garden

  • Unlock tools from an old sketchbook

  • Receive heartfelt letters from loved ones

  • Cherish memories of Frida with each passing day.

A Tale in The Garden offers a nostalgic and reflective narrative about aging, set in a beautiful environment, inviting players to immerse themselves in a gently paced, peaceful adventure.
